sqlGroup.name: enterprise
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_TENANT_E_USER WHERE UPPER(C_USER) = ? AND UPPER(C_PASSWD) = ? AND R_SID = ?

sqlGroup.name: navgate
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_NAV ORDER BY R_SID, N_INDEX

sqlGroup.name: profession
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT B.* FROM SYS_TENANT_E_PROFESSION A INNER JOIN SYS_PROFESSION B ON A.P_PROFESSION = B.SID WHERE A.R_TENANT = ?

sqlGroup.name: template
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT A.* FROM SYS_TEMPLATE A INNER JOIN SYS_PROFESSION B ON A.SID=B.R_TEMPLATE WHERE B.SID=?

sqlGroup.name: tenantUser
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM TENANT_USER WHERE TENANT_CODE=? AND USER_CODE=? AND USER_PASSWORD=?

sqlGroup.name: attachText
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_ATTACH_TEXT WHERE R_TABLE=? and R_FIELD=? and R_SID=? and R_TENANT=? and P_TENANT=?

sqlGroup.name: enterpriseProfession
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_TENANT_E_PROFESSION WHERE R_TENANT=? and P_PROFESSION=?

sqlGroup.name: enterpriseUser
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_TENANT_E_USER WHERE SID=? and UPPER(C_PASSWD)=?

sqlGroup.name: governmentUser
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_TENANT_G_USER WHERE SID=? and UPPER(C_PASSWD)=?

sqlGroup.name: multiPara
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_PARA_MULTI WHERE C_NAME=(SELECT C_NAME FROM SYS_PARA_MULTI WHERE SID=?)
